title: Learning Social Relation Traits from Face Images
authors: Z Zhang, P Luo, CC Loy, X Tang - arXiv preprint arXiv:1509.03936
excerpt: Abstract: Social relation defines the association, eg, warm, friendliness, and dominance, between two or more people. Motivated by psychological studies, we investigate if such fine-grained and high-level relation traits can be characterised and quantified from face  ...
